articles.author: Julie Bort
articles.title: Sam Altman says OpenAI has $20B ARR and about $1.4 trillion in data center commitments - TechCrunch
articles.description: Altman named a long list of upcoming business he thinks will generate significant revenue.
articles.content:
Rarely has a month gone by in 2025 without OpenAI signing another multibillion-dollar data center deal. In a lengthy post on X on Thursday, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman publicly clarified the totals.
“We e… [+1406 chars]

articles.title: Popular Sleep Supplement Could Be Harming Your Heart, Doctors Warn - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A five-year review of over 130,000 adults with insomnia found that long-term melatonin use was linked to a higher risk of heart failure and death, prompting researchers to call for further study into its cardiovascular safety. People who regularly used melato…
articles.content: New research suggests that long-term melatonin use for insomnia could increase risks of heart failure and death, challenging the supplement’s reputation as a safe, natural sleep aid. Credit: Shutters… [+8771 chars]
